subject: AI & Agents
title: Does ChatGPT Understand You?
description: A short lesson to help you apply Does ChatGPT Understand You?.

hook.text: You share your feelings with ChatGPT and it responds with empathy. Does it actually understand you?

buildup.text: LLMs predict the most likely next words based on statistical patterns in training data.

discovery.text: Understanding requires experience and meaning. LLMs have neither â€” only patterns.

twist.text: The Chinese Room thought experiment: following rules to produce correct Chinese doesn't mean understanding Chinese.

climax.text: Whether pattern matching at sufficient scale becomes understanding is philosophy's hottest debate.

punchline.text: It writes like it understands. That's not the same as understanding.

quiz.question: What does the Chinese Room argument illustrate?
